resources.string: Tap the black rectangle on the bottom row to advance the game. That\'s it!\nTry to go as fast as possible without messing up for the best score.\nPro tip: You can tap anywhere in the column belonging to the rectangle on the bottom row.
Speed mode allows you to tap as far as you can without making a single mistake.\nYou will be scored on the speed you complete all of the taps.

Accuracy mode allows for some mistakes. But, if your mistakes exceed 10% of the total taps required, you will instantly lose.
The grid will flash red when you tap incorrectly.
You will be scored on speed as well as your accuracy after completing the taps.
This mode is generally much longer than Speed.
Endless mode has no end unless you tap incorrectly.\nYou will be scored on the number of taps and speed.
